append(sLive, ret[v]...) } inArray := func(i uint64, arr []uint64) bool { for _, v := range arr { if v == i { return true } } return false } rt := make([]uint64, 0) for _, v := range sDie { if len(str)-at]) } return i } for _, mv := range mouse { for _, dv := range bottle { str := strconv.FormatUint(dv, n) i := strRightAt(str, mv) if i == k { solution[mv] = append(solution[mv], dv) } } }
